description:
Whether you’re replacing an old tube or grabbing a spare, the Hydraflex tube will have you drinking taste-free water effortlessly. At 91cm long and 6mm wide, this is perfect for routing and wont kink during use.

  • Made of durable TPU that is 100% BPA and PVC free for peace of mind on the trail
  • Plug-N-Play® connect system to disconnect the tube for super easy refills
  • Comet™ self-sealing bite valve keeps you hydrated effortlessly
name: Hydrapak Hydraflex Tube
